main event: On July 15, 1968, several witnesses observed an elongated, saucer-shaped unidentified object near New Philadelphia, Ohio, which they could not identify as an aircraft or balloon.
interesting points: The object was described as white or silver and saw it moving in an erratic manner., The sighting lasted for approximately 2 minutes., Witnesses reported the object changed shape and disappeared suddenly., The weather conditions at the time of the sighting were bright with cumulus clouds., The object did not produce any sound during the observation.
witness description: multiple observers reported the object moving in the sky
